absProxyBasePath.description: The base path to prefix to all absproxy requests

appName.description: The name to use in branding. Will be shown in titlebar and welcome message.

auth.description: The type of authentication to use. When 'password' is selected, code-server will auto-generate a password. 'none' disables authentication entirely.

cert.description: Path to certificate. A self signed certificate is generated if none is provided.

certHost.description: Hostname to use when generating a self signed certificate.

certKey.description: Path to certificate key when using non-generated cert.

disableFileDownloads.description: Disable file downloads from Code. When enabled, users will not be able to download files from the editor.

disableFileUploads.description: Disable file uploads to Code. When enabled, users will not be able to upload files to the editor.

disableGettingStartedOverride.description: Disable the coder/coder override in the Help: Getting Started page.

disableProxy.description: Disable domain and path proxy routes.

disableUpdateCheck.description: Disable update check. Without this flag, code-server checks every 6 hours against the latest GitHub release and notifies once a week when updates are available.

disableWorkspaceTrust.description: Disable Workspace Trust feature. This only affects the current session.

enableProposedAPI.description: Comma-separated list of VS Code extension IDs to enable proposed API features for.

extensions.description: Comma-separated list of VS Code extensions to install. Format: 'publisher.extension[@version]' (e.g., 'ms-python.python,ms-azuretools.vscode-docker').

githubAuthTokenFile.description: Path to a file containing your GitHub auth token.

hashedPasswordFile.description: Path to a file containing the hashed password used for authentication. The password should be hashed with argon2 and be in the encoded form. This takes priority over `passwordFile`.

host.description: The address to bind to for the code-server. Use '0.0.0.0' to listen on all interfaces.

locale.description: Set VS Code display language and language shown on the login page. Format should be an IETF language tag (e.g., 'en', 'fr', 'zh-CN').

logFile.description: Path to a file to send stdout and stderr logs to from code-server.

passwordFile.description: Path to a file containing the password used for authentication.

port.description: The port to bind to for the code-server.

socket.description: Path to a socket. When specified, host and port will be ignored.

socketMode.description: File mode of the socket when using the socket option.

trustedOrigins.description: Comma-separated list of trusted-origins to disable origin check for. Useful if not able to access reverse proxy configuration.

version.description: The version of code-server to install. If empty, installs the latest version.

welcomeText.description: Text to show on login page.

workspace.description: Path to the workspace or folder to open on startup. Can be a directory or a .code-workspace file.
